required_header.download_date: ClinicalTrials.gov processed this data on November 19, 2021
required_header.link_text: Link to the current ClinicalTrials.gov record.

clinical_study.brief_title: Prevalence of COVID-19 in a French Dependent Care Facility for the Elderly and in a French Long-term Care Unit: Observational Study
clinical_study.official_title: Prevalence of COVID-19 in a French Dependent Care Facility for the Elderly and in a French Long-term Care Unit: Observational Study

brief_summary.textblock: The aim of this study is to evaluate the prevalence of COVID-19 among the residents and geriatric inpatients of the care facilities attached to the Centre Hospitalier Sud Essonne (a general hospital located in Ile-de-France, France), and the factors that are likely to influence this prevalence.

detailed_description.textblock:
Among people exposed to the COVID-19 (SARS-COV-2) pandemic, elderly people are considered as particularly vulnerable, especially those living in nursing homes or hospitalized. Furthermore, facilities / accommodations are registered among the main locations of COVID-19 clusters.
These observations have led the French government to establish specific protection measures and survey dependent care facilities for the elderly and long-term care units in the hospital.
With these new standards established, a long-term study of all the residents and geriatric inpatients of the care facilities attached to the Centre Hospitalier Sud Essonne (a general hospital located in Ile-de-France, France), can provide additional knowledge on COVID-19.

primary_outcome.time_frame: Through the study completion, an average of 12 months
primary_outcome.description: measures the prevalence of COVID-19 among the residents and geriatric inpatients, defined as resident and patients with positive serologic or RT-PCR test

secondary_outcome.time_frame: Through study completion, an average of 12 months
secondary_outcome.description: no RT-PCR test or negative RT-PCR test and positive serologic test, positive RT PCR and no symptoms.

secondary_outcome.time_frame: Through study completion, an average of 12 months
secondary_outcome.description: Positive RT-PCR test or serologic test with symptoms

secondary_outcome.measure: Number of residents/inpatients with severe form of COVID-19 which led to an hospitalization
secondary_outcome.time_frame: Through study completion, an average of 12 months
secondary_outcome.description: Positive RT-PCR test or serologic test and hospitalization

secondary_outcome.measure: Number of residents/inpatients infected with COVID-19 and hospitalized in a critical care unit
secondary_outcome.time_frame: Through study completion, an average of 12 months
secondary_outcome.description: Positive RT-PCR test or serologic test and hospitalization in critical care unit

secondary_outcome.measure: Number of residents/inpatients infected with COVID-19 and deceased
secondary_outcome.time_frame: Through study completion, an average of 12 months
secondary_outcome.description: Positive RT-PCR test or serologic test and deceased

secondary_outcome.measure: Number of residents/inpatients vaccinated against COVID-19
secondary_outcome.time_frame: Through study completion, an average of 12 months
secondary_outcome.description: Positive RT-PCR test or serologic test and vaccinated with any authorized vaccine

secondary_outcome.measure: Influencing factors of the prevalence of COVID-19 among residents/inpatients
secondary_outcome.time_frame: Through study completion, an average of 12 months
secondary_outcome.description: age sex comorbidities the context of the infection with COVID-19 vaccinated or not

intervention.description: Periodic testings and testings with characteristic symptoms occur

study_pop.textblock: Residents and geriatric inpatients of the care facilities attached to the Centre Hospitalier Sud Essonne (a general hospital located in Ile-de-France, France), from march, 2020, to december, 2021, who are not opposed to participate in this study.

criteria.textblock:
Inclusion Criteria:
- residents of the dependant care facility for the elderly
- inpatients of the long-term care unit
- from march, 2020 to december, 2021
Exclusion Criteria:
- opposition to participate in this study
